name: Organic Whole Wheat Bread
description: Freshly baked whole wheat bread made with locally sourced organic flour. No preservatives.

name: Mountain Flower Honey
description: Pure raw honey collected from the high meadows of Naryn. Rich in antioxidants.

name: Fresh Farm Milk
description: Pasteurized organic cow's milk from grass-fed cows. High in calcium and protein.

name: Quinoa Seeds
description: Organic white quinoa, perfect for salads and healthy bowls. Gluten-free superfood.

name: Dried Apricots
description: Sun-dried apricots from Batken. No added sugar or sulfur dioxide.

name: Herbal Mountain Tea
description: A soothing blend of wild thyme, mint, and oregano hand-picked in the mountains.

name: Rye Sourdough
description: Traditional fermented rye bread with a rich, tangy flavor and crispy crust.

name: Homemade Raspberry Jam
description: Classic grandmother's recipe with organic raspberries. Perfect for breakfast.
